title: Citigroup CFO John Gerspach to Present at the Goldman Sachs 2013 Financial Services Conference
summary: New York - John Gerspach, Chief Financial Officer of Citigroup, will present at the Goldman Sachs 2013 Financial Services Conference on Tuesday, December 10, 2013. The presentation is expected to begin at approximately 12:30 p.m. (Eastern). A live webcast will be available at www.citigroup.com/global/investors. A replay and transcript of the webcast will be available shortly after the event.
tag-1: Citigroup CFO John Gerspach to Present at the Goldman Sachs 2013 Financial Services Conference

tag-3: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
